text: rajadhirajayanange abhisheka manggalya manu lowehi aarambha wana bawa diwasin dutuwawu yugandharara masthakayehi solos dahasak diwyu nalanganun piriwara kotagena dew sapawidina dedewlowa dewiyanta adhipathiwu “sakdewrajahu” wisin ee thama piriwara atharawu “yamanam” gandhirwaga dewiputh kandawa oohata dewiya yuthu gandha”rwana naluniliyan ha thatha sushira awa nada ha ghana yanadi wadya bhanda yanda dewa - mathu manulowa pawathinase shanthi githika (nibada githi) diya ha “panycha thuyy nadayath” manulowa “mahasammatha hishekaya” pinisa pawathwayi bharakota manu lowata ewana laddaha- eki “sama dewiputh” wisin swani minigigiri ha dakshinanawrutha thrigautha, pralamanawu swarna bheriyada urala thamahata sahayawana gandhakarwa diwa naluniliyan sathdahasada piriwarakotagena - maha pruthiwiyayehi wu mahasammatha rajabhishekaya pawathwime manggalyaka udesa manu lowata sampraeptha wuha.

idiri sathi kihipaya thula kriyathmaka me idam meheyuma thula niwasa ha janawasa sanwardhanayata athyawashya siyalu bim kotas handuna ganimata hakiyawa labe.idiriye di apa samajaye jiwath wana siyalu janakotas sandaha jiwathwimata sudusu niwasak idikara ganima wenuwen awashya siyalu sahana sapayamin ee sama jana kandayamakatama awashya karanna wu mulika pahasukam sahitha niwasa wyapruthi wen wen washayen salasum kota kriyathmaka kirimata katayuthu yoda thibenawa.ema niwasa yojana krama apa amathyanshaya wisin danatamath salasum kota athi athara, ee thulin apa rate jiwathwana dugi duppath janathawatath, adu aadayamlabhi prajawatath, madhya aadayamlabhinta niwasa pahasukam sapayimata awasthawa salasenawa athi.me siyalu niwasa wyapruthin 2011 wasare aarambha karana athara ee thulin jathika niwasa sanwardhana adhikariyata wishala karyabharayak pawarena athara ee prathilabhi niwasalabhinge yuthukama wanne rajya dayakathwayen niwasalabhinge sahabhagithwayen kriyathmaka karana me jathika niwasa wadasatahana sarthaka kara ganima wenuwen purna sahaya laba dima bawada pawasiya.me jana hamuwa awasanaye di amathi wimal wirawansha mahatha pramukha niladharin wisin jayawadanagama niwasa kramaye kshethra charikawaka niratha wemin adala niwasa kramaye yatithala pahasukam ha podu sewawan nirikshanaya kirima da sidukarana ladi.mema awasthawata idikirim, injineru sewa niwasa ha podu pahasukam amathyanshaye athireka lekam ke.

wiwidha kshethra wala paryeshana katayuthu pulul kirima sandaha jathika paryeshana sabhawe prathipadana rupiyal miliyana 500 kin wadikirimata yojana karanawa.nanasalagaru kathanayathumani, 2020 di danuma kendrakaragath aarthika gamanmangata prawesha kirimata 2015 di sama grama niladhari kottasayakatama anga sampurna nanasala madhyasthayak idikirima sandaha rupiyal miliyana 1,000 k wenkirimata yojana karanawa.wiwidha palath wala pihituwa athi ape wishwawidyalawalin ema pradeshawala kiri, saththwa ha mathsya gowipalawal aahara thakshanaya, redipili, gruha bhanda ha thyaga bhanda nirmana aashritha thorathuru, kuda wyawasayakayinta gramiya mattamen nanasala madhyasthana magin labadima diriganwena paridi wishwawidyala paryeshana pulul kirima sandaha rupiyal miliyana 500 k ha nawa nipayam lokayata handunwadime aramudalak pihituwima sandaha rupiyal miliyana 500 k wenkirimatada yojana karanawa.kalawa ha sanskruthiyagaru kathanayakathumani, pasu giya ayawayen yojana kala paridi mahanuwara ha anuradhapura prasanga kala ha sanskruthika madhyasthana 2016 wasaredi sampurna kirimata salasum kara thibenawa.

usawi niyogayak da nothaka harimin kolambaa nagaraye wirodhatha wyaparawala niratha wu sarasawi sisun athadanguwata ganna bawa shri lanka polisiya pawasayi.eeye, badada janadhipathi nila niwasa idiripita wirodhatha wyaparawala nirathawa siti sarasawi sisun kandayamakuyi athadanguwata ganimata salasum kerenne.polis madhya prakashaka jyeshta polis adhikari ajith rohana madhyayata adahas dakwamin kiya sitiye, sarasawi sisu wirodhatha pagamanata adala widiyo pata polisiya wisin adhikshanaya karanu labemin pawathina bawayi.usawi niyogaya kolambaa nagaraye karya bahula mahamargawala ewani pelapali gaman ganima rathawahana thadabadayakata menma mahajanathawatada apahasu thathwayak athi karana heyin, ema pelapaliya athhituwana men illa sitimin kurunduwaththa polisiya kolambaa mahadhikaranaya wetha mosamak idiripath kala athara eya salakillata gath adhikaranaya pelapali pawathwimen walakina men sisunta niyoga kara thibuni.eheth ema adhikarana niyogaya nothaka anthar wishwa bala mandalaye sisun saha rajarata wishwa widyalaye saukhyaya widya anshaye upadhi apekshakayo wirodhatha pagamanaka niratha wemin araliya gaha mandiraya idiripita wadi la udghoshanayaka niratha wemin sitiyaha.sisun illa sitiye thamanta janadhipathiwaraya hamuwimata awasthawak laba dena lesayi.wasara hatharaka sama saukhyaya upadhi pata malawa(
